question.text: You are in a one-way street and want to turn right. You should position yourself

explanation.text: If you’re travelling in a one-way street and wish to turn right you should take up a position in the right-hand lane. This will enable other road users not wishing to turn to proceed on the left. Indicate your intention and take up your position in good time.

answer.text: in either lane, depending on the traffic
just left of the centre line
